status_legend.0: Normal Operation - The turbine is in normal power production mode
status_legend.1: Derated Operation - Derated power generation with a power restriction
status_legend.2: Idling - Asset is idling and waits to operate again
status_legend.3: Service - Asset is in service mode / service team is at the site
status_legend.4: Downtime - Asset is down due a fault or other reasons

summary: Across the 6‑hour window the turbine spent all 37 ten‑minute intervals in Normal Operation with steady, near‑rated production (power_mean 0.969, low variability; rotor_rpm_std 0.023 and generator_rpm_std 2.33), alongside relatively high average winds (14.84 m/s) and typical pitch behavior (pitch_mean 9.14). Notable anomalies in the signals include a brief extreme wind speed maximum (39.2 m/s) compared with otherwise modest variability, sustained yaw misalignment on average (~10.22), elevated temperatures (temp_mean 65.16), and a consistently negative power residual (mean −0.0649) indicating production running below the reference model over the period.
